subject: SMLI
title: Accelerated Beginning Somali I
info:
Review of grammar/usage, practice in reading/writing. Introduction to Somali literature and formal writing. Topics in Somali culture. 

prereq: EPT Placement of SMLI 1225 and ability in basic spoken Somali

subject: SMLI
title: Accelerated Beg Somali II
info:
Review of grammar/usages, practice in reading/writing. Introduction to Somali literature and formal writing. Topics in Somali culture.

prereq: 1225 or instr consent

subject: SMLI
title: Intermediate Somali
info: Review of grammar/usage, practice in reading/writing. Introduction to Somali literature and formal writing. Somali culture.

subject: SMLI
title: Intermediate Somali I
info:
Intermediate level Somali language for undergraduate students. 

prereq: SMLI 1222

subject: SMLI
title: Intermediate Somali II
info: Intermediate Somali language for undergraduate students.

subject: SMLI
title: Int Somali Grad Research I
info: Intermediate Somali language for graduate students.

subject: SMLI
title: Int Somali Grad Research II
info: Intermediate Somali II for graduate students.
